sections.heading: off another's livestock; penalty
sections.text: Any cattle drover, or his employee, who shall drive off any neat cattle, horses, mules, or sheep belonging to another person, intentionally or through neglect, shall be guilty of a Class V misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1879, ยง 2, p. 67;R.S.1913, ยง 97;C.S.1922, ยง 105;C.S.192
